article_text:
Sen. John Cornyn (R-Texas) spoke at the 2014 Conservative Political Action Conference on Friday, following a fellow Texan: Gov. Rick Perry.

Cornyn, who won a GOP primary against Rep. Steve Stockman (R-Texas) earlier this week, said conservatives predicted problems with the Affordable Care Act.

“We conservatives predicted things like this would happen," Cornyn said.

See more from CPAC below:
